articles.author: Andrew Howard
articles.title: Americans sour on Trump’s handling of economy, poll finds - POLITICO
articles.description: The new survey is a major warning sign for the president as he launches a global trade war.
articles.content:
His 56 percent disapproval rating on the economy is the highest mark measured in a CNN poll since the beginning of his first term.
Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick is facing internal criticism for … [+775 chars]

articles.title: RFK Jr. is targeting ultraprocessed foods. What are they, and are they bad for you? - WSYR
articles.description: In the Trump administration’s quest to “Make America Healthy Again,” there may be no bigger target than ultraprocessed foods. Robert F. Kennedy Jr., the nation’s new health secretary, has cited “highly chemically processed foods” as a chief culprit behind an …
